name: BSynth
description: A polyphonic DSP synthesiser featuring dual detuned sawtooth oscillators, a Moog-style ladder filter with LFO modulation, ADSR envelope, and built-in reverb. Controls for Attack, Decay, Sustain, Release, LFO frequency, Room Size, Damping, Wet level, and Width.

name: PViz
description: A simple pitch visualizer plugin that displays the detected pitch of incoming audio in real-time. It features a clean interface with a large display area for the pitch information, making it easy to see the detected notes at a glance.
